Test CSS.getContainerForNode method for node with container queries
{
    id : <number>
    result : {
        nodeId : <number>
    }
    sessionId : <string>
}
Is the returned container the expected named container?
true
{
    id : <number>
    result : {
        nodeId : <number>
    }
    sessionId : <string>
}
Is the returned container the expected unnamed container?
true
{
    id : <number>
    result : {
        nodeId : <number>
    }
    sessionId : <string>
}
Is the returned container the expected dynamic container?
true
